Bioclimatic pergolas

A bioclimatic pergola can be installed leaning against a wall or stand alone in any open space.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” class=”row-padding-top” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”right” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”small_desktop” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”default” gradient_type=”default” offset=”vc_col-md-4″][image_with_animation image_url=”2369″ image_size=”full” animation_type=”entrance” animation=”None” animation_movement_type=”transform_y” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”custom” max_width_custom=”200px” margin_bottom=”20px”][vc_column_text]

What is a bioclimatic pergola?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text max_width=”400″]Its main feature is the roof with adjustable blades that allows you to manage, depending on weather conditions, the optimal entry of light and air; closed, it represents a completely waterproof and protected environment, a real extra room for your home and for any public establishment.

Easily combinable modules and plenty of side closure solutions, totally transparent, filtering or darkening, allow the widest possibility of customization and total flexibility, for any housing or commercial project.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column left_padding_tablet=”60px” left_padding_phone=”0″ column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” A bioclimatic pergola can be installed leaning against a wall or stand alone in any open space.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text-2column”]Its main feature is the roof with adjustable blades that allows you to manage, depending on weather conditions, the optimal entry of light and air; closed, it represents a completely waterproof and protected environment, a real extra room for your home and for any public establishment.
In summer a bioclimatic pergola represents the most comfortable shelter from the sun, in the mid-seasons it can become a protected and always bright environment, in winter it can create a magical and warm atmosphere for total immersion in nature, all year round.
Easily combinable modules and plenty of side closure solutions, totally transparent, filtering or darkening, allow the widest possibility of customization and total flexibility, for any housing or commercial project.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”none” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”
